caption: Literally paying my bill and writing this review. What an aweful  experience! Food was okay nothing special! The service was horrible. Waiter’s not once came to the table to check on the food or even ask if we needed anything. No hospitality at all... but then expect a decent tip. I typically never write reviews but hopefully next time we can get some nice and hospitable service. It’s like being at shake shack and even their service is better. Disappointed.

Food is fine. Staff needs a bit more hospitality training. When I approached the manager to suggest the like. I was met with a sigh of frustration and a simple “ I do not have time to talk to you today miss” . The end. ✨
I think they upped their game. The outdoor seating is nicely done with no wind, very doable on an evening. Good portions, good taste, good service. And seriously, wine for only USD 10!?
Great food, friendly staff and lovely outdoor dining.

This place is amazing! The outdoor covid shack is awesome. Service is impeccable. Food is delicious. Everything here is great.  Steak sandwich was made to order, covered with grilled onions and portabello mushrooms was perfect. The chicken grilled with Grand Marnier also perfectly sweet and tangy.  The covid shack was decorated for the holidays and it was cozy and comfy. The service was professional, to the nines. Seriously, I have to come back and soon. You should too
A real treat service,food,atmosphere on point.

Love it here! Staff went above and beyond for arranging this last minute wedding celebration!  Assisted with table option and dessert- food was authentic and ambiance was back the old style me NYC, with all the safety precautions of COVID taking place.  Will definitely be back!
This place was incredible. Amazing decor, inside and outside dining areas. Highly recommend. Service was top. Not sure why this place doesn’t have 5 stars already

Decided last minute to get a bite to eat & came here.. The food was absolutely delicious & a really nice outdoor seating area as well ! Was so surprised to see our meals being served with both regular & sweet potatoe fries, oh they were so yummy !! I also think for the portions that you get, they're not expensive at all ! Definetley going to come back again if we're in the area..
Highly recommended. I had an amazing dinner here. Very friendly staff and that grilled salmon Dijon was delicious 😋
Filthy disgusting restaurant, this is unacceptable especially during these times of Covid 19 on top of that it was a rude old witch that was our waitress bad food & rude service

Manager is very rude. I was walking with my 4 year old daughter when she had to use the bathroom so bad she was close to using it on herself and I asked them if I can pleas possibly use the bathroom for my daughter. The rude lady asked where I was sitting and I informed her I was not dining there that I was just taking a stroll with my daughter. She proceeded to deny my FOUR year old of the bathroom because she was too “busy” , I’m sorry, is your restaurant busy or your bathrooms? Then she basically shoved passed me and dismissed me and my daughter.  Disgusting.
My margarita drink was disgusting.  They messed up the order twice and the last time it was not properly made. The food was dry and I will never visit this establishment again.
Great food great service - love it. Thank you for a nice table and hospitality
Great, be sure to check it out

Came here with friends and it was a great treat. Got some wings which werent spicy which is just my style. Not too crunchy bit crispy enough with the sauce. The mozzarella caprese was wonderfully balanced with the balsamic glaze and pesto with a hint of roasted pepper to go with the creamy fresh mozzarella. The service was wonderful and the ambiance was perfect. Sitting outside we almost forgot it was a pandemic with how beautifully decorated the outdoor seating is. Quality food. Wonderful atmosphere and attentive service. 💜

We got here just in time on a Saturday night before it got too busy. The customer service was nice. I was able to order a well done steak which came out medium well so I had them make it well done and I ordered the Linguine as a side instead of fries. And the sangria drink was nice and I ordered ice cream do desert I taste the salt caramel but I ordered the mango and coconut sorbet.
Nice little bar. Great old fashioned by the bartender.
Best pizza I ever had, service was Outstanding, everything was excellent. I love this place.
Best service ever. The bartender Disi was amazing!!!!
Amazing food. The service is amazing as well and the atmosphere is perfect.

(Translated by Google) Wonderful and true Tiramussú Typical restaurant in southern Italy. All employees are Italian. The dough is not to the tooth, but the ragout made with roasted meat was wonderful. As it was minus 8 degrees outside, it was quite appropriate. I don't know what the summer menu is like.  (Original) Tiramussú maravilhoso e verdadeiro Restaurante tipico do sul da italia. Todos os funcionários são italianos. A massa não é ao dente, mas o ragú feito com carne assada estava maravilhoso. Como estava menos 8 graus lá fora, foi bem apropriado. Não sei como é o cardápio de verão.
Interior was beautiful. Drinks was good. Reasonable prices.
I don’t write reviews, but this staff was the most incredibly kind group of people I have ever met. Absolutely phenomenal customer service.

(Translated by Google) Old fashioned Italian. I ordered a Negroni, which was not on the menu, and I was served a yellow drink, when the Negroni is reddish. The food is not bad, nor the desserts, however, nothing spectacular. Priced at the level of most New York Italian restaurants. Brand new waiters need more experience.  (Original) Italiano à moda antiga. Pedi um Negroni, que não constava do cardápio, e me serviram uma bebida amarelada, quando o Negroni é avermelhado. A comida não é ruim, nem as sobremesas, porém, nada espetacular. Preço no nível da maioria dos restaurantes italianos de New York. Garçons novinhos, precisam de mais experiência.
Is the best restaurant in Brooklyn. I enjoyed food and drinks. Pasta it was very delicious😍!
Interesting place! The steak was perfect, the spaghetti with meatballs not so good but overall everything was fine.
All I can say excellent... I have since return twice
Greatest service

Worst service I have ever experienced. We were gonna order drinks and Dessert after our main dish but we got thrown out of the restaurant because new guests have been waiting. So when I refused to pay an overpriced tip I was told to be grateful to be allowed to eat here and that there are not my slaves. So ridiculous. I've never seen anything so brazen. We were really upset..
Over priced

Hi we just wanted to have some coffee maybe cake or dessert in this place and to warm us go on toilet.... they opens the door just a few centimeters and told us coffee just to go. Ok we looked for a different place couldn't find one because it's Christmas day... We decide to take a coffee so that one person could quickly use the toilet. A women opens and would give us coffees but as we asked for a toilet they won't let us in...she did shut the door as quickly as she could. What's that? It's Christmas and we would pay 10 dollars to use your toilet? I would never recommend that place as I don't understand how you can be soooo unfriendly...

(Translated by Google) Found on the fly with availability of place from the outside I would have expected more slow service, food just enough for Italian palates certainly the kitchen to be improved in all, the services (bathrooms) say unclean, we would need more attention to the customer.  (Original) Trovato al volo con disponibilità di posto dall'esterno mi sarei aspettato di più servizio lento , cibo appena sufficiente per i palati italiani sicuramente la cucina da migliorare in tutto , i servizi ( bagni ) diciamo non puliti , ci andrebbe più attenzione al cliente.
Very good service 👍, food is excellent, very flavored, good portions
Wonderful service
Great place. Not what you expect. Try it.
Excellent, i loved the food and the people Great prices as well

The best service and amazing food!! My husband ordered pasta and  it was fantastic. I ordered fish it was delicious. The best service and food for a nice lunch or dinner. It was our anniversary and we had a great time.

No idea why this place does not rate in the 4+ category. Our visit was very pleasant, food was awesome, both in taste and presentation. Will definitely be back when we visit Dumbo!! Thanks so much for your experience!!
(Translated by Google) One of the best nights, great service and kindness in all services  (Original) Una de las mejores noches,  un gran servicio y una amabilidad en todos los servicios
(Translated by Google) Well  (Original) Bom
Staff here was very rude.
Bartender was on 10 great atmosphere had good time sat at the bar at enjoyed brooklyn.

HORRIBLE I want there with my friends prices are extremely high for tourists but that’s not what bothered me food is disgusting and customer service is worse I got food poisoning from here STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE
Rude waiters

I was going to sit outside,  still hot from walking over Brooklyn bridge.. went inside bar..cold beer, clams and mussels all good.. but that's not why my rating is 5 stars its the experience of great warmth and conversation with their Bartender, she gave me a whole new look at millennials.. Thank You..
(Translated by Google) I loved. A coffee on your terrace is priceless.  (Original) Me encantó. Un café en su terracita no tiene precio.

It's absolutely absurd for a restaurant serving over-priced and below average Italian food to also have a rodent problem. If you want some sketchy Italian food, there are so many better options in this city. Don't waste your time here.
Love this restaurant. Nice people and excellent food in the heart of Dumbo. Sit outside and get the best view of the city and Brooklyn bridge. Will keep coming back:)

(Translated by Google) Barman very welcoming! Friendly place near Brooklyn Bridge and Manhattan Bridge! The bar is beautiful and you can enjoy the Brooklyn. Affordable price and impeccable service  (Original) Barman très accueillant ! Lieu convivial à proximité de Brooklyn Bridge et de Manhattan Bridge! Le bar est magnifique et on peut y déguster de la Brooklyn. Prix abordable et service impeccable

Simply amazing Italian experience. Everything was perfect, from drinks to the pastas we had. Service and restaurant presentation was perfect too. I was iffy due to the price but it was worth every penny.
Excellent service, very professional staff
Very delicious chicken with potatoes. Our server was also very friendly and professional.

Nothing Special. I intended to go to Juliana's Pizza near, but so crowded there. So I randomly picked this Italian restaurant out, walking along the street. The place was atmospheric and romantic to me. But one member of my party said it was old-fashioned and tacky. The owner was welcoming us. The service was professional and quick. The staff was helpful when it came time to order our food. I ordered the Shrimp Linguini with anchovies and my party got Grilled Salmon Dijon and Chicken Meal. My choice was the best because the other foods were mediocre. The saltiness of the anchovies and capers went well with the other ingredients and pasta was cooked perfectly. It was worth every penny. So if you come here, I recommend this item strongly. Overall, it wasn't too bad, but it was nothing special. IMO, it was overpriced for the quality and quantity. I think one-time is enough for me.
Great drinks they customized mine every time I'm here Service is great they even gave my dog a drink 😊🐶 Bartender is good Definitely recommend
Good food and great atmosphere
(Translated by Google) Cute  (Original) Lindo
The food was ok but a little expensive. Not much choices
Very good food,but worst servise.Six waiters for three table inside  can't afford nothing. Come on guys.....

(Translated by Google) The place is nice but the service is pesimo the food a little expensive there megores nicer places cheaper and more tasty  (Original) El lugar es bonito pero el servicio es pesimo la comida un poco cara ahi megores lugares mas amables mas baratos y mas sabrosos
Atmospheric and excellent service

username: sylvia ypiranga de souza dantas e rodriguez

caption: Went there with my girl. Ordered Mediterranean Salad. As soon as I saw the lettuce I thought it might not be fresh because it had a weird color. I tried it. Decided to exchange it for a different salad. Guys gave me different salad I didn’t pay for the first one. After getting back home I spend the whole night by the toilet vomiting. I do not recommend this restaurant.
The service is not nice, very expensive for nothing. Other restaurant in the area are better in all point of view .

The food was just ok and over priced for the quality. The waiter didn’t even ask us if we wanted coffee or desert just brought us the check without even asking if wanted anything else. My husband & I won’t be coming back the food was just plain nothing special.
Great
Kind of small but good was good

(Translated by Google) We had lunch and if we had a word with the waiters they brought us the bill, without asking for dessert, we told them that we wanted to order dessert and they told us that they were already closed and we could see that more customers were coming and serving them food, desserts ... NO I RECOMMEND  (Original) Almorzamos y si mediar palabra con los camareros nos trajeron la cuenta, sin pedir el postre, le comentamos q deseábamos pedir postre y nos dijeron que ya estaban cerrados y pudimos comprobar q estaban entrando más clientes y sirviendo les comida, postres... NO LO RECOMIENDO
(Translated by Google) Very nice restaurant and good food. Not very cheap.  (Original) Sehr schönes Lokal und gutes Essen. Nicht ganz günstig.
Nice service, nice food, nice surroundings!

(Translated by Google) Just acceptable for an American perhaps ... for an Italian I would say to avoid. Better the burger of the next room that at least you know what to expect rather than being disappointed by a kitchen that has only the Italian name. Above average prices for quality.  (Original) Appena accettabile per un americano forse...per un italiano direi da evitare. Meglio l'hamburger del locale di fianco che almeno sai cosa aspettarti piuttosto che rimanere delusi da una cucina che di italiano ha solo il nome. Prezzi sopra la media per la qualità.

(Translated by Google) A place where you can see Brooklyn Bridge and have dinner. We had steak and pasta outdoors, even though we had an outdoor table, and it was a hundred times right to eat stew or other food twice in the bar. I'm glad I was the first steak I've eaten in New York. I would regret eating Peter Steak or steak like the Wolf River and eating it here if I hit the ground and lost 30,000 won. It is a safe place to just hunger.  (Original) 브루클린 브릿지를 구경하고 저녁식사를 할 수 있는 곳. 야외 테이블까지 있어서 야외에서 스테이크와 파스타를 먹었는데, 그냥 스테이크는 여기서 먹을 바에 쉑쉑이나 다른 음식을 두 번 먹는게 백번 옳다. 뉴욕와서 처음 먹어본 스테이크여서 다행이지, 피터루거나 울프강 같은 스테이크 먹고 여기서 먹었으면 땅을 치며 3만원 버린 걸 후회할 뻔. 뭐 그냥 대충 허기 떼우기에는 무난한 곳이다.
Ok food. The place was nice and service good. But the food was just ok. And I think is was just over priced for the quality and quantity of the food.
(Translated by Google) Poor quality of food, bad taste, high price due to the product  (Original) Mala calidad de comida, mal sabor, precio elevado en razón del producto

(Translated by Google) Very expensive, because of the type of food, the meat is hard. Ask the prices to sit down.  (Original) Muy caro , por  el tipo de comida , la carne dura . Pregunten los precios de sentarse.

(Translated by Google) Restaurant in the DUMBO region of Brooklyn. Very cozy.  (Original) Restaurante na região de DUMBO, no Brooklyn.  Muito aconchegante.
Excellent food. Even better staff

(Translated by Google) Excellent food, service of the best, atmosphere very well achieved. The bad thing is that it is expensive and they do not have wifi.  (Original) Excelente comida, servicio de lo mejor, ambientación muy bien lograda. Lo malo es que es caro y no tienen wifi.
SUCH GOOD FOOD!!! Would go there again and again!

Wonderful service and the food was great! They, without hesitation and no reservation, seated all 7 of us and accommodated 2 more that joined our party later on. Highly recommend. Definitely will be back out next visit to New York!

(Translated by Google) We entered by chance, and we really liked the treatment and the food, we ordered roast duck (to share) and it was delicious. Without a doubt, a great success.  (Original) Entramos por casualidad,  y nos gustó mucho el trato y la comida, pedimos pato asado (para compartir)y estaba delicioso. Sin duda todo un acierto.

If i could i would give this place no stars the service was horrible we were left standing for about 20 minutes while other people were being taken care of as soon as they walked in i I have never felt so uncomfortable in a restaurant my entire life and i honestly do feel it was a race issue very disappointed. I never come back even not think to eat

The owner/manager is rude and unwelcoming. If you want to be treated like a piece of s**t then go to this restaurant.

Awful staff. Really bad service. Stay away from this place because you’ll be treated with total disrespect, which is weird because you’d imagine a business in the customer service area would do better?
Awesome
Excellent food and service. One bite into my fettuccine pasta and I was transported to my trip to Italy. Will definitely be coming back.

The place itself has a great ambiance and the decor is lovely. Some of the staff were superficially friendly. It almost felt like they were rushing you to get in and out so they could continue with their lives. The food I felt like was a bit overpriced. Not sure I would come here again.
(Translated by Google) Italian style. Picturesque. Good coffee and sweets.  (Original) Estilo italiano. Pintoresco. Buen café y dulces.
It's been my second time visiting this place and so far I've enjoyed it. Wheather it was with good company or the place it seem all good.
No hitter outdoor 🤔

Very bad experience. Menu says steak with French fries and vegetables but the server told us they don't have that but he will fixe it just for us ,well you just trying to take "fake" give us extra sir service , same goes for my lamb shank that was pretty good. We ordered medium steak but we got chewy well done with one piece of every vegetable, wine wasn't good at all. Also for appetizers we ordered crab cakes and it was a disaster,frozen boxed ONE Crab cake,with huge pieces of lettuce. Never going back,this is a beautiful place with potential to be good if managed right but most important is Food ,it has to be good!
(Translated by Google) Terrible service / awful experience  (Original) Pésimo servicio / awful experience

(Translated by Google) Very good, good service, good dishes; It cheats the appearance, you think it's going to be expensive but it's not, always taking into account the average prices in New York. The staff is extremely nice food was good the cheesecake was the best thing
Went on a Christmas Eve, was one of the very few restaurants open. Drinks and food were ok and probably towards expensive side.
The food was good but its very hot inside, and the seats at the front were crammed together so close that you would hit the person across from you.

(Translated by Google) Without infamy and without edible praise the dilapidated bathroom the first we found it was 40 degrees after the Brooklyn Bridge you see almost the saints in heaven and you jump into the first place you find without a tail to the sun that's all  (Original) Senza infamia e senza lode mangiabile il bagno fatiscente il primo che abbiamo trovato c’erano 40 gradi dopo il ponte di Brooklyn vedi quasi i santi in paradiso e ti fiondi nel primo posto che trovi senza coda a sole tutto qua
Good service, good food in a nice location.

Three major points:  - Food was okay for lamb shunk, salad and penne marinarae except desert was not good at all. - Waiter who served our table was not professional enough. E.g. When i request something he ignored me intentionally and after a while I hadd ask him again to bring what i asked for. For the other waiters, they were nice. - They care so much about gratity that they draw a square on the tip amount and the total charges. I can feel it when they went a head to check the table before I exit the restaurant. In addition, the prices were high compared to the food quality and experience you get.
(Translated by Google) 10 points all  (Original) 10 puntos todo
Nothing to like about this place except the waitress. Food sucks and pricey as hell. TIP included in the bill for even 2 people like we were. Haven’t seen this before

Really bad experience. Cheese Ravioli hard to eat. Fettuccine overcooked and the meet sauce was cold. Prosciutto sandwich very poor. Now I understand why all restaurants around were full and this one was totally empty. Staff was ashamed for the poor quality of the food but they were friendly with my family. Managing needs to make deep changes at the kitchen or this business is not going to survive.....

I went to eat there and the waiter was kind but there was a girl in the staff staring at our table the entire time. I did not understand why but I felt profiled. People need to be mindful of their staring. Food was excellent Salmon Dijon. Otherwise would have given 5 stars

I wanted to get paid for giving bread, so I refused to give Parmesan cheese on the way. Not recommended if you are really gourmet  (Original) 웨이터 아저씨 당신은,, 이탈리아인입니까,,,? 한국아닌 외국에서 맛보는 첫 파스타였습니다. 누가 드시는거보고 먹고싶다고 생각해서 들어와 앉아 저거 뭐냐고 물어봐서 페투치니 시키고 먹었어요. 혹시 빵주는거 돈받는건가싶어서 도중에 파마산 치즈 준다는것도 거절하고 ㅋ ㅋ ㅋ ㅋ 완전 바보대행진 별 세개반정도 주고싶어요 웬만하면 평타는 칠듯 진짜 미식가시면 비추천해요

Great place 😊 Cozy and nice restaurant with good food and great service. The place is rarely hidden by the crowd of people looking for the pizza restaurant - but that isn’t fair since this place is as good 😊 I will recommend this place.

(Translated by Google) Old and dark place, basic menu, average service, passable salad, expensive for what it is.  (Original) Lugar viejo y oscuro, carta básica, servicio regular, ensalada pasable, caro para lo que es.

First restaurant I've ever been to where refills on iced tea is not free.  Also horrible 2 topper tables.  Cannot put legs under the table due to several corbels that hit your knees.  Ordered the fettuccine and was shocked when it came out with red sauce.  Bread was a cold roll.  Way over priced.

Food is excellent, had me dancing in my seat

Nice place inside, service was fully ok and pleasant, we tried pasta and it wasn’t bad but also nothing I would have to say wow. Mozarella in caprese was really fresh... with two glasses of prosseco we paid quuite a lot (slightly over 100$)....
Hidden Gem in Dumbo right by the Ferry.   Flavorsum food that is easy on your budget. Gorgeous architecture n design all hand made by the owners brother.
Nice services with great food. If you don't wanna line up for the famous pizza, this place is another good option instead.
Service was friendly enough and the food was okay.
Nice place
Good food, but the (not really friendly) waiter literaly stole my last bread.

This is not a friendly place. I do not recommend it at all. The owner is so rude and unfriendly. As a tourist, even if i go to some place and obviously I will not come back because I do not live here, I don t like to be treated that way. Very bad experience.
Had a great experience at 7 Old Fulton. Great service, friendly staff and the owner Julia was very welcoming. Definitely will be back!
Attentive service and relaxing ambience. Delicious Baileys coffee
Good services..

Place was empty.  So the service was great because the place was empty. My date got the meat lasagna which was a small portion and very watery. I got the steak which was ok.  They didn't specify the cut (flank,  porterhouse,  filet) but for what it was it was decent.
Horrible food. Feel bad for this place which seemed great. Ordered a prosciutto sandwich and the bread was actually a rock. Literally.
Very good! Thank you.
Nice little restaurant
Food was average , definitely not worth the price.

(Translated by Google) I give it a star because there is no option to leave it blank. To make the story short: tourist death trap. Bad management, terrible treatment and deception included, taking advantage of the large influx of tourists and its privileged location at the foot of the Brooklyn Bridge.  Those who have time and want more detail: I was there with my husband in November 2017. We stopped at that place with the idea of ​​consuming something quick before returning to Manhattan and being able to use the services. At the door was an employee in charge of picking up customers and arranging them inside. We expressly told him that we were just going to have a coffee at the bar and he said it was perfect. Once inside, the woman who attended us was friendly until she heard the request. Then he changed his face and told us in very bad ways that an impossible coffee because in the kitchen (they really don't have a coffee machine in the bar?) They were overflowing. He literally said "they are crazy in the back" - They are crazy back there. (Thank you, Madam, for sharing with the clients the weight of your ineptitude). The fact is that between one thing and another it was my husband at the service and then me. There was a queue to enter the bathroom, for both men and women, and then the bathroom itself (there was one) was also clogged. I do not know if I explain. While waiting, I chatted with an Italian in our same situation and he said something that my husband had already agreed to buy two coffees to go. The waitress serving the bar in no way wanted us to "run away" without consuming and agreed to prepare those coffees when we saw that we were using the service. By the way, they were so bad that we threw them out after taking two sips. Worse than a vending machine. Of course, at $ 4 each.  Anyway, the poor Italians had worse luck than us, they were with two children and in the end they ended up consuming beer, sweets and whatever it was that they let them go to the bathroom. They just wanted a coffee ...  Clear expression of a place exclusively oriented to get the bitches out of the client (tourists, mostly) at the cost of treating him like cattle and giving him an unpresentable service.  (Original) Le doy una estrella porque no hay opción de dejarlo en blanco. Para hacer el cuento corto: trampa mortal para turistas. Mala gestión, pésimo trato y engaño incluido, aprovechándose de la gran afluencia de turistas y de su localización privilegiada al pie del puente de Brooklyn.  Quienes tengan tiempo y ganas de más detalle: estuve allí con mi marido en noviembre de 2017. Paramos en ese local con la idea de consumir algo rápido antes de volver a Manhattan y poder usar los servicios. En la puerta había un empleado encargado de recoger a los clientes y acomodarlos en el interior. Nosotros le dijimos expresamente que íbamos solo a tomar un café en la barra y nos dijo que perfecto. Una vez dentro, la mujer que nos atendió fue amable hasta que oyó el pedido. Entonces cambió la cara y nos dijo de muy malos modos que un café imposible porque en la cocina (de verdad no tienen máquina de café en la barra?) estaban desbordados. Literalmente dijo: "they are crazy in the back" - Están como locos allá atrás. (Gracias señora por compartir con los clientes el peso de su ineptitud). El caso es que entre una cosa y otra fue mi marido al servicio y luego yo. Había cola para entrar al baño, tanto de hombres como de mujeres, y luego el baño en sí (había uno) estaba también atascado. No sé si me explico. En la espera, charlé con un italiano en nuestra misma situación y me dijo algo de que mi marido ya había acordado comprar dos cafés para llevar. La camarera que atendía la barra no quería de ningún modo que nos "escapásemos" sin consumir y accedió a preparar esos cafés al ver que usábamos el servicio. Por cierto, estaban tan malos que los tiramos después de dar dos sorbos. Peor que de una máquina de vending. Eso sí, a $4 cada uno.  En fin, los pobres italianos tuvieron peor suerte que nosotros, iban con dos niños y al final acabaron consumiendo cerveza, dulces y lo que fuera para que les dejasen ir al baño. Solo querían un café...  Clara expresión de un local orientado exclusivamente a sacarle las perras al cliente (turistas, en su mayoría) a costa de tratarlo como ganado y darle un servicio impresentable.

Beautiful bar ambiance but the cocktails are out of season and all the food overpriced. It has definitely leaned on being a Brooklyn bridge hot spot with tourists wanting anywhere to sit outside. Have a cocktail and then wait for the better restaurants to open up for service at 5:30.
(Translated by Google) Everything we could try was very good  (Original) Todo lo que pudimos probar estaba muy bueno
popped in for drinks on a hot summer day - staff was friendly and liked the quirky old-world atmoshphere

It's so annoying to have dinner here. The waitress who seemed to be the manager of this place (and old woman) was asking so many times for a reservation without noticing her "restaurant" was empty. Never eat the FRUIT salad. The menu doesn't have a description about what type of fruits this meal has. But that's not all. The lady wasn't able to answer which fruits were served with the salad. She just said "fruits" it has all fruits. Ridiculous place. Totally pretentious

Seriously DON’T bother coming here ..... I now realise why other restaurants in the area had lines of people waiting to get in & this place had none!!!! We were desperate to eat & in a hurry!  The staff were rude & incompetent, the food took for ever to arrive & when it did it was poor to put it very politely  We walked out in the end but had to pay for the rubbish they served!!!!!  This was the WORST RESTAURANT I’ve eaten in for ages - GO ANYWHERE BUT HERE !!!! Even our tour guide warned us away !!!!! But sadly desperation & hunger foolishly lead us to this revolution :((((((
Tourist trap Mediocre food with high proces
Food was average. Price was a bit high for what we got. The service was sub par. It's really unfortunate considering the location and the built in audience.
I can't remember having a worst meal .
Disgusting tourist trap. Got a rotten lettuce salad, rotten fruit salad, and found a piece of unwrapped gum in another salad we ordered.  Avoid this place at all costs
Bad food and way overpriced.
(Translated by Google) Unpleasant staff and poor, expensive food!  (Original) Otrevlig personal och dålig, dyr mat!

No lineup at this restaurant (compared to julianas and grimaldis) was a red flag. Food was very plain. Server was not great even with a bit of attitud. We had complimentary bread served, it was Horrible. Cold and tasteless they didnt even bother to heat. When I told the server about the bread he just replied well its just an appetizer don't expect too much. Appalling. Stay in line at the other restaurants this just overpriced plain food

Food was good but the service was weird. They kept seating everyone outside and when we asked about a table inside the lady said they were "reserved" even though most of the dining area inside was empty and remained empty till the end. 🙄 And the waiters were a bit arrogant.
l just eat chicken cesars salad.lettuce inside salad is not fresh and clean.it was terrible.
Nice looking restaurant, not a very desirable menu. Semi-decent service...
We ordered fettuccini with beef, it wasn't any beef in our pasta, they messed up our drinks.

(Translated by Google) A tease of siege. $ 75 for two plates of pasta with tomato and a sparkling water? Very very bad  (Original) Una tomadura de pelo de sitio. 75$ por dos platos de pasta con tomate y un agua con gas?  Muy muy malo

Decent experience. Atmosphere was good because there was no one there and we were put right by the fireplace - we liked that. We got salmon and steak, the food was decent. Salmon had great sauce. Service was professional and quick. Prices were okay, could be better priced but you're also dealing with a prime location here.

Had the unfortunate opportunity to go here. The bartenders were clueless about even the most basic drinks. They messed up 2/3 of my buddy's drinks, and his drinks were VERY basic. The waitress wasn't happy when we said we didn't want any food, which was odd.
The food was OK. But the old lady was a not polite person.
(Translated by Google) Very welcoming, beautiful surroundings, pleasant and relaxing. Good dish.  (Original) Très accueillant, beau cadre, agréable et reposant. Bon plat.

The staff welcomed me in with my disabled grandson in the pouring rain even though it was not really opened. They went out of their way to let us dry out and serve us coffee.  Much better than an adjacent facility!

I don't know guys who rated this place one or two stars is the matter with you. Do you get good food and service in other places or all is bad everywhere? I had only good experience today. The Chianti Classico that said 2015 in the wine menu was actually 2011. Today's specials we ordered - the fish and seafood pasta were very good. Waiters were nice. So, no complaints, except that wine list could be improved.
Yummy food, decent prices and charming setting. For those complaining about the service...travel to Italy and you will understand. Perfect place for a break in my day!!!
Beautiful ambiance, great staff. First time in Brooklyn and Nina was very helpful to us Chicago tourists

(Translated by Google) $ 18 for pasta with tomato sauce and poor service - to the extent that I had to ask for my credit card's whereabouts until I got it back ...  (Original) 18$ für Nudeln mit Tomatensoße und schlechter Service - soweitgehend, dass ich nach dem Verbleib meiner Kreditkarte fragen musste, bis ich sie zurückbekam...
Disgusting customer service! Horrible atmosphere!!! Bad tasting food😡😡😡😡
Food was nasty and old
Clams were old and overcooked with type of  Red sauce , when I returned it they still charged me for it.
Unique location with good food and service.
A nice old bar to have a drink and a bite. Staff is friendly and helpfull.
Sandwich was mostly bread, waiters got an attitude when I told them about it, very expensive and underwhelming

Never ate there but when I stopped by for an emergency bathroom visit I was rudely rejected by the woman at the entrance (I presume the owner) with a clear racist attitude and offensive demeanor. I guess this one is off my list of places to visit. FOREVER.
Over priced and bad service. Places like this make me question why I must tip.

(Translated by Google) Very nice and cozy, but the treatment of the waiters is lousy, as if you were asking for a favor. We were saved by a Latin waitress who was there that night and who really treated us very well. / Very beautiful and cozy place, but the service is not too good. Thanks to a latin waitress that gave us a real good service, but the others treated us like we were begging. The man on the door was very nice too.  (Original) Muy bonito y acogedor, pero el trato de los meseros es pésimo, como si estuvieras pidiendo un favor. Nos salvamos por una mesera latina que había allí esa noche y que realmente nos trató muy bien. / Very beautiful and cosy place, but the service is not too good. Thanks to a latin waitress that gave us a real good service, but the others treated us like we were begging. The man on the door was very nice too.
Excellent food and wine. Bit xpensive
My compliments go just to the waiters: it should be hard to work in such a chaotic place. The food is average and prices are high. You only have a view if you sit outside.

The food was underwhelming,  my fruit salad was not fresh at all.  We ordered a steak and it was very bland.  My wife ordered the fish plate of the day and they threw a warm fish on top of a salad instead of one the side. My Peroni beer was just over room temperature. The ambiance was very odd, the best part was the bread they gave us before the food.   I would expect a bit more for these prices. The service was good.
The food is out of this world.  It is delicious.
Amazing best meatballs !!
Service is terrible

Expensive food,  horrible portions and ridiculous situation in general!!! There was an ant on the table several tines and the waiters didn't do anything about it!!!  An ant!!!!! Serving was good and our waiter was really nice though,  hence the one star.
We took  a glass of wine here. Fantastic view over down town Manhattan. I absolutly recomend it!
Amazing food and service! Try the ñocci!

After looking all the reviews didnt want it to enter to this place. But as everywhere was full except this one that had a few seats I decided to eat something quickly. Service is good, the burguer was good and the cheescake was ok. The 2 bartenders Dasha and Yulia were always asking if everthing was good, very attentive. Some people just come in a bad moon an put bad reviews killing some bussiness. Come to have a beer, take a seat, eat something quickly  and later enjoy a nice walk next to the river. I DO recomend this place

The service is a joke. I just love going to the area for a walk once in a while, and finally decided to give this place a try without regard to previous reviews. The place looked cozy inside. The EXPERIENCE: The waiter had attitude and was arrogant so much that he cared more for striding with importance between tables, than to actually care for the them. Once food arrived, I could not grab his attention anymore, so had to ask his coworker to get the check after about 30 minutes. No refills, no check-ups if all was good, nothing. The bar has a joke of a selection of hard liquors, and since they didn't have anything that I liked, the bartender suggested an awful digestif, only allowing me to sniff at it, no samples. I could barely drink it. The person sitting behind at the table appeared to be the owner or manager. Was yelling loudly all the time and listening to music on his phone, and pestering waiters passing by with loud comments. Just AVOID this place, until a better one comes to its place.

I think i'm the only one that didnt try the pasta but i can guarantee that the lamb and steak are great. I recommend you to order some appetizers because entrees can take a while. (I think pasta is faster)
(Translated by Google) Good lasagna  (Original) Buena lasaña
WORSE place ever. The ruin our holidays.  They took the reservation for New Years with one price, and they just called one day before the date offering the double of price. AWFUL!
(Translated by Google) In everything good, the Maitreya treats you very badly, avoid this place  (Original) Adentro todo bien, el Maitreya te trata muy mal, evitar este lugar
Old timey bar/restaurant right under the Brooklyn bridge.
Nice atmosphere close to the stunning view on Manhattan. The food was good even if a bit expensive. Friendly service.

Food was very good. Every thing was cooked perfect. The reason for 2 stars are waiter was alfull. Had to ask 4 times for my Dads soda and twice for my borther in laws. We order dessert and to coffees that we never got the coffees. There are so many places  around that have good food so when you come for a day and you live 2 hrs away you not only want great food but you want good service.

House Salad and cheese  ravoli were good, but  service was poor - waiters were watching a soccer game on TV for a good 2 minutes before they noticed our presence, among other things. Serving sizes are on the small side and not always as hot as they could be. There are better Italian restaurants.

Extremely priced tourist trap with salads and sandwiches a kid could make better. The mediterranean salad had 2 Cherry tomatoes, 4 cubes of feta and 4 olives on top of ice berg salad. The vegetable sandwich didn't even have any sauce/vinaigrette.
So authentic and delicious! We ordered Grilled Salmon Dijon and Grilled Steak. Service was ok and definitely will be back!
Excellent food and service! We had a table out doors with amazing views. We ordered Old Fulton Cheeseburger  and Pasta Linguine with delicious side dishes. Love it. Definitely will be back!

When the staff treat customers like they are an inconvenience you know you have chosen a bad place to eat. This establishment benefits from being underneath the Brooklyn Bridge and having a large funnel of tourists cycle through. It is unfortunate as the ambiance of the place has a charming tackiness to it. The quality of the food did not match the price

(Translated by Google) AVOID AT ANY COST! Unpleasant servers, excessive price, meal quality far from the price. They are open 1 hour more from the restaurant upstream (Juliannia's, which is very famous) and we feel that it is not for nothing, with this schedule it allows them to recover customers who have failed to return home Julianna's and therefore do not care at all from the client! We were even given stale bread!  TO AVOID AT ALL COSTS! The worst restaurant I ever seen! Expensive, poor quality, poor service!  (Original) A EVITER A TOUT PRIX ! Serveurs désagréables,  prix excessif, qualité du repas loin d'être à la hauteur du prix. Ils sont ouvert 1h de plus de le restaurant en amont (Juliannia's, qui est très réputé) et on sent que ça n'est pas pour rien, avec cet horaire cela leur permet de récupérer les clients qui n'ont pas réussi à rentrer chez Julianna's et de ce fait ne se souci pas du tout du client ! On nous a même apporté du pain rassi !  TO AVOID AT ALL COSTS ! The worst restaurant I ever seen ! Expensive, poor quality, poor service !
Great!
(Translated by Google) Hunting for tourists.  (Original) A la caza de turistas.
Very miserable looking staff. Waiter shoved himself past us without saying excuse me. Took 20 mins for the bartender to get our drinks. Looks like the staff hates each other.
I had the best moscato wine, it was perfectly chilled and had slight bubbles. The place is small but great wine list and lots of options.

PLEASE AVOID THIS PLACE!!! IT'S A TOURIST TRAP!!! GO TO JIULIANAS TO GRIMALDIS TO SHAKE SHACK.ITS NOT ITALIAN RESTAURANT FOOD IS OVERPRICED, HOW CAN YOU SERVE 99 CENTS pasta with 4 minuscule shirmps for so much???? THE SALAD 95% LETTUCE AND 2 tomatoes and 2 pieces of dirty cucumber??? EVERYTHING IS DIRTY HERE. AND THE SPANISH LADY WHO BARELY UNDERSTOOD ENGLISH  SIMPLY THROW THE PLATES ON THE TABLE, TOTAL DISRESPECTFUL. RUDE OWNER WHO WAS YELLING IN THE WHOLE RESTAURANT AT EVERYBODY, HE WAS SO STINKY, DRUNK AND ASLEEP AT THE BAR WHEN WE LEFT..NO RESPECT AT ALL.... THE LADY OWNER WITH HARD ACCENT (ALBANIAN AS BARTENDER SAID) WAS EXTREMELY RUDE AND IMPERTINENT GIVING US ATTITUDE, TRYING TO PUSH US A CHEAP WINE FOR A TRIPLE PRICE, THEN PUSHING US ''SPECIALS''...HORRIBLE WOMAN...THEY DONT KNOW WHAT MEANS COSTUMER SERVICE.THEY DON'T CARE ABOUT PEOPLE. PLEASE GO BETTER TO MCDONALDS....DON'T GET FOOLED.!!!!!!!!!

I had dinner here on the 30/12/2015, and today I was checking my bank transactions and discovered that they actually charged me FIVE TIMES for the dinner. So They charged me an extra $452 on my debit card!  I called to ask them to fix it, and they told me I had to go there in person with the receipt (which of course I don't have). When I told them I wasn't in town, but could send the proof by email, they told me they didn't have a computer. I ended up calling the fraud division at my bank and they are dealing with it now. Stay away!

we were supposed to go to Grimaldis but it was closed. Since this was the only place in the area that was open on Christmas Day, we went there instead.  The food was so bad and so expensive! The servers and the manager are rude as well.
We liked their burger :) Good place for a romantic date.

If you're looking for delicious Italian food, keep walking and don't stop at this place. If you want a low calorie count meal and lose some weight then stop here, the food portions are as big as my cereal spoon. Literally, I can scoop the whole plate with one spoon. If you want a dinner that takes you back to your childhood when mamma used to cook in the kitchen while you ate the dog's food, then please stop here and try the fettuccine and ask for an extra scoop of Pedigree. And don't forget to bring your drink because you'll never get one in this place.

(Translated by Google) Of sorrowful grief ... eye to those who ask for a card as a guarantee. I gave them mine debit from La Caixa thought that debit cards in NY did not work and it turns out that I will charge you in cash and by card !!! with a couple .... luckily it was 48 dollars that if it becomes more we get expensive hot beers and nachos we drink. I did not pin or sign anything but the minimum approach standards in the US are different from those in Spain, and I have had to pay twice ... at least I learned the lesson. You know, if they ask you for a card, you tell them that nanai ... or at least don't give it up until you go to pay. I think they did it in bad faith ... because I told the waitress clearly that I planned to pay in cash and she told me it was only as a guarantee ... what a tip she caught that night in October 2015 .....  (Original) De pena penosa...ojito a los que os pidan una tarjeta como garantía. Yo les di la mía de debito de la Caixa pensado que no funcionaban las de débito en NY y resulta que me cobraros en efectivo y por tarjeta!!! con un par.... menos mal que fueron 48 dólares que si llega a ser mas nos salen caras las cervezas calientes y los nachos que nos tomamos. No puse pin ni firmé nada pero las normas de lo mínimos de aproximación en EEUU son diferentes a las de España, y me ha tocado pagar dos veces...al menos he aprendido la lección. Ya sabeis, si os piden una tarjeta les decís que nanai... o al menos no la entreguéis hasta que vayáis a pagar. Creo que lo hicieron de mala fe...porque le dije clarito a la camarera que pensaba pagar en metálico y me dijo que sólo era como garantía...menuda propina pilló esa noche de Octubre de 2015.....

Horrible staff and energy. When we asked the waiter about music his response was to listen to the cars passing by for their radio. Very rude. We felt we were being critiqued instead of helped. There are definitely better places to go to in Brooklyn. This is NOT one of them. Unless you want cold dinner and awkward staff.
I had a simply delicious the coffee mousse....indescribable

Last night, My partner , Timmy and I ate here.  Throughout the whole  night.  he was Tossing and Turning all night after what seems to  Normal dinner.  I had mussels and Clams. Timmy on the other hand, had Spaghetti and meatball,  The service was bad.   The tap water came in room temperature.  I had to ask for ice and the waiter did not know whom/ where to obtain them.  After seeing her run back and forth the reatuatuant twice.  she finally brought us a glass of ice.   They were cheap on the bread and butter as well == We had to ask again.. The place was very inattentive.   Timmy got sick from the spaghetti all night,  I had a feeling it was either the  meatballs that look processed since you can cut it like butter  OR the gradated cheese they gave him from a canister and not freshly gradated by hand..  I called 311 and filed a report  4:35AM   ==     DO NOT EAT THERE.  I should have seen the sign since the place was empty to begin with and all the other place were crowded and people waiting in line.  There was an old man and a young lady who were wearing RED t- shirts.  I asked  one of the waiters who it was , he old me that he is a waiter.  First of all, He was on the phone carrying on for the duration of our stay, Why would any establishment would let their waiter  eat and talk in public on his cell phone in view of the public.  Also his female companion seems like she was running the restaurant .  She was running around changing the climate control in the restaurant and helping our waiter  our bill.  Their staffs are unequipped   and were not giving the necessary training / tool to run this place.   This place is a F===ing joke and so is the owner.

(Translated by Google) Very good food. The Old Fulton Burger was sensational. I had the spaghetti with meatballs. However, there is a point less because of the hefty price of $ 14 for the burger and $ 18 for the spaghetti.  (Original) Sehr gutes Essen. Der Old Fulton Burger war sensationell. Ich hatte die Spaghetti mit Fleischbällchen. Aufgrund des stolzen Preises von 14 $ für den Burger und 18 $ für die Spaghetti gibt's aber einen Punkt weniger.

I've passed by this spot many, many times and only discovered it was a restaurant through a Google Maps search for a birthday celebration. Guests are definitely more tourists than locals as evidenced by our server's surprise to hear our party was all Brooklyn natives, but the dishes are fantastic! Classic Italian pasta dishes are the way to go. My lasagna is still a dish I'm thinking about weeks later. The appetizers are a bit on the small side but the entrees will definitely fill you up. Pretty decor, outdoor seating and they accept credit cards.
Over priced, odd atmosphere and confusing service.
Italian food . Good Price and nice people.

Adorable little Italian place steps away from the Brooklyn Bridge.  The interior is beautifully decorated and cozy.  Prices seem a little high, but the quality of the food is fantastic.  Ask about the nightly specials.
Was ok.
amazing food and a great experience
Great food at the right price!. recommended!
(Translated by Google) Very good restore, superb service. thank you. Ophélie & Hubert La France.  (Original) Tres bon restaurent , service superbe. merci à vous. Ophélie & Hubert France.
Edible is the best way to put it. If you have ANY other choice in the area, take it. Even if its Subway. Very weird, over priced, and out of touch place. Great location though!
worst pasta ever.
The Food  Was great  i order  a plate of lam champ's  the best i  ever had  WOW !!!!!!!!!! Strongly Recommended  if your visiting one of the greatest city Brooklyn .....
(Translated by Google) Home bad. Owner interested in tipping and falsely friendly.  (Original) Accueil mauvais. Propriétaire intéressée par le pourboire et faussement aimable.

Nice atmosphere, like the wooden decor not to loud. Romantic spot near the Brooklyn birdge, good for a date. Food portions alittle small and expensive but worth it. nice wine list... I'll definitely be going here again. The girlfriend loved it.

The bread basket said it all - cheap tasteless bread, served with 2 butter containers, except there was no butter - it was marinara sauce (yep!) in one and olive oil with  two olives in the other container. The soup was watered down, the parmesean cheese was old and on top of it the waitress claimed it was fresh, no apologies there. The service was chaotic, had to get up from the table to go ask for service. Wait staff only cared to ask for more orders of  wine/ beer/ other alcohol.  Overheard the waiter telling the young group at the next table that people from all over the world eat there - tourists visiting the bridge, lured in like us by the decor and the cheerful welcome. Avoid this place, run a mile from it.
